name: Am I Not Here?
description:
THIS PLACE SEEMS FAMILIAR… BUT WHAT WAS REALITY REALLY LIKE? 

Why are you back here? A voice awaits at the place you arrive, and he seems to know what’s going on. Am I Not Here? is a journey of discovery, of answers and questions, of a lifetime experienced in seconds. 

A journey of two realities. 

Choose what is real and what is not. 

FEATURES 

- Immersive narrative experience, told in 45-60 minutes and a wide variety of sceneries, from life memories to abstract corners, based on surrealism imagery. 

- Unique reality switch mechanic, with two versions of each scene. Navigate through them to solve puzzles and understand what happened. 

- Surprises waiting for you to discover them. 

- Full narrator voiceover. 

- Two different endings, depending on your own choice. 

CREDITS 

Game made by Javier Llorente, Raúl Pernía, Claudia Vega, Ricardo Cancela, Diego Pérez, Jordi Galobardes and Víctor García.
